meanings.definition: A type of chair that can be adjusted to a reclining position for added comfort.
meanings.sent1: The family room had cozy recliners where we could relax after a long day.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents love their new recliners in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the recliners were giant beds made just for her.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the recliners in the backyard seemed to whisper relaxation.
meanings.sent5: The plush recliners in the theater made the movie experience even better.

meanings.definition: Those who recline or relax in a reclining chair.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends were all happy recliners during the movie night.
meanings.sent2: The recliners in the waiting room were all engrossed in their magazines.
meanings.sent3: The lazy cat joined the recliners on the porch for an afternoon nap.
meanings.sent4: The recliners at the spa felt like they were floating on clouds.
meanings.sent5: The tired hiker became a content recliner by the campfire.
